channel.title: CVE Feed for 10web -- Form Maker by 10Web – Mobile-Friendly Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 10web -- Form Maker by 10Web – Mobile-Friendly Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-0667|2024-08-01T18:11:35.670Z -- 10web -- form%20maker%20by%2010web%20%E2%80%93%20mobile-friendly%20drag%20%26%20drop%20contact%20form%20builder
item.description: The Form Maker by 10Web – Mobile-Friendly Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.15.21. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the 'execute' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary methods in the 'BoosterController' class via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-2112|2024-08-01T19:03:38.662Z -- 10web -- form%20maker%20by%2010web%20%E2%80%93%20mobile-friendly%20drag%20%26%20drop%20contact%20form%20builder
item.description: The Form Maker by 10Web – Mobile-Friendly Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.15.22 via the signature functionality. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including user signatures.

item.title: CVE-2024-2258|2024-08-01T19:03:39.193Z -- 10web -- form%20maker%20by%2010web%20%E2%80%93%20mobile-friendly%20drag%20%26%20drop%20contact%20form%20builder
item.description: The Form Maker by 10Web – Mobile-Friendly Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via a user's display name autofilled into forms in all versions up to, and including, 1.15.24 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2258|2024-06-04T17:30:27.169Z -- 10web -- form%20maker%20by%2010web%20%E2%80%93%20mobile-friendly%20drag%20%26%20drop%20contact%20form%20builder
item.description: The Form Maker by 10Web – Mobile-Friendly Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via a user's display name autofilled into forms in all versions up to, and including, 1.15.24 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2112|2024-06-04T17:29:48.676Z -- 10web -- form%20maker%20by%2010web%20%E2%80%93%20mobile-friendly%20drag%20%26%20drop%20contact%20form%20builder
item.description: The Form Maker by 10Web – Mobile-Friendly Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.15.22 via the signature functionality. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including user signatures.
